channel.title: Quick help! [Rep++]
channel.description:
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/3VbHi.png[/img]
That explains my problem; I need help making a space between my title and my actual username.
In addition, does anyone know how to make the title colored both in chat? Like when you talk it shows the runescape color for title (@or2@ I think) and in the chatbox, it should be colored too when you don't talk.
Please help! Thanks

item.title: Quick help! [Rep++]
item.dc:creator: @Code_kai Code kai
item.description:
@Code_kai wrote:

private void buildAtPlayerMenu(int i, int j, Player player, int k) { if(player == myPlayer) return; if(menuActionRow >= 400) return; String s; if (player.skill == 0) { s = player.name + combatDiffColor(myPlayer.combatLevel, player.combatLevel) + " (level-" + player.combatLevel + ")"; } else { s = "@or2@" + getRank(player.skill) + "@whi@ " + player.name + combatDiffColor(myPlayer.combatLevel, player.combatLevel) + " (level-" + player.combatLevel + ")"; } I think?

Read full topic
